item.title: CLONE WARS Tabletop Tower Defense
item.description: CLONE WARS is a AR Tower Defense Game based in the Star Wars universe. The Player scans a 3D space, then they can add towers and enemy spawners. Each round, the towers must defend the playerâ€™s ship from waves of enemies. The player can use points earned each round to buy more towers. The game was originally a friend’s school project that grew into a personal project with a team of four.
